channel.title: [PI] Command Help [PI]

item.title: [PI] Command Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You’ve never specified the player that it should be given to. I don’t work with PI, but I think this loop will work.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("givepoint")) { String name = playerCommand.substring(10); for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.dailyPoints += 1; c2.sendMessage(c.playerName + " has given you a point."); c.sendMessage("Successfully gave a point to: " + c2.playerName + "."); } } } }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Command Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

I’m trying to make a command that gives a point to someone due to some people not receiving it automatically.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("givepoint")) { try { for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.dailyPoints += 1; c2.sendMessage(+c.playerName+" has given you a point."); c.sendMessage("Successfully gave a point to: "+c2.playerName+"."); } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }
But that doesn’t work. Help?

Read full topic
